_header: Of wisdom I have most plaint
_description: Dialogue between a king and four philosophers — four couplets

StPauls9Dxix.Transcription:
Of wysdom I haue most plenteþat godeness sterys bot lytyl
                    meeQuayntys of me men leryn mayquayntes meyngyd with falsyd hayTo
                    to loue as wylt I haue lentloue out of skyll mony Mon haþe
                    schentI loue clenness with al mi miȝtWith þe to dwell I haue
                    most riȝt
